thread.title: One person dead after hit-and-run in Denver early Saturday morning
thread.title_full: One person dead after hit-and-run in Denver early Saturday morning - The Denver Post

author: Elizabeth Hernandez
title: One person dead after hit-and-run in Denver early Saturday morning
text:
One man is dead after a vehicle hit him while he was walking and then fled early Saturday morning in Denver, officials said.
The crash happened in the 3000 block of Walnut Street around 12:15 a.m.
No suspect information was available at the time of the crash.
This is a developing story that will be updated as more information becomes available.
Elizabeth Hernandez: 303-954-1223, ehernandez@denverpost.com or twitter.com/ehernandez
